title: A Plain favlt in plain-English. And the same in Doctor Fearne: who (upon different grounds) build one error; but this is the best of it, that their difference destroyes the same error, which they would build upon the ruine of Parliaments.
author: Evelyn, John, 1620-1706.
notes: Attributed to John Evelyn or to Edward Bowles in the Wrenn catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
